TopicTitle: My Kerbin Orbital Outpost and standard launcher!

Articles.Content:
I just thought it'd be cool to share my ideas for a small 1.25m station, and as I still don't understand how to embed albums and I'm lazy, here's the link:

http://imgur.com/a/c4nJD

I'm experimenting with unusual rocket design, so I decided to pull a Falcon 9 and put 8 LV-T30s(Non gimbal 215kN, right?) and a Skipper in the middle. Let me know of any other interesting and unusual rocket designs like this, I had fun building this first stage, as simple as it is.

Thanks for checking this out, let me know how to embed albums and if you have any cool unique ideas for rockets!

-Slab

To embed the above album:

[ Imgur]c4nJD[/imgur]

Type it just like that only remove the spaces and you get this:

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Cool, thanks. Any ideas for interesting first stages?
